renderpass.code:
#define NUMBER_OF_KEYS 256.
#define IS_PRESSED 0.0
#define ON_PRESS 0.5
#define BUFFFER_PRESS 1.0

#define KEY_TAB 10./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_ENTER 14./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_SHIFT 17./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_CTRL 18./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_ALT 19./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_SPACE 33./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_ARROW_LEFT 38./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_ARROW_UP 39./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_ARROW_RIGHT 40./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_ARROW_DOWN 41./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_0 49./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_1 50./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_2 51./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_3 52./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_4 53./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_5 54./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_6 55./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_7 56./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_8 57./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_9 58./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_NUMPAD_0 97./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_1 98./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_2 99./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_3 100./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_4 101./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_5 102./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_6 103./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_7 104./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_8 105./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_NUMPAD_9 106./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_GREATER 61./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_SS 64./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

#define KEY_A 66./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_B 67./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_C 68./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_D 69./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_E 70./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_F 71./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_G 72./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_H 73./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_I 74./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_J 75./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_K 76./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_L 77./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_M 78./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_N 79./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_O 80./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_P 81./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_Q 82./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_R 83./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_S 84./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_T 85./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_U 86./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_V 87./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_W 88./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_X 89./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_Y 90./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.
#define KEY_Z 91./NUMBER_OF_KEYS - 1./512.

//between 1. and 256.
const float id_test = 98.;

//between 0. and 1.
const float key_test = KEY_NUMPAD_9;

//example isKey(KEY_A, IS_PRESSED)
bool isKey(float key, float type){
    return texture( iChannel0, vec2(key, type)).r > 0.0;
}







void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    // Normalized pixel coordinates (from 0 to 1)
    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy;

    // Time varying pixel color
    vec3 col = vec3(0.);
    
    float key = id_test;
    
    if(uv.x > ((key-1.) / NUMBER_OF_KEYS) && uv.x < (key / NUMBER_OF_KEYS)){
        col.g = 1.0;
    }

    col.r = texture( iChannel0, uv).r;
    
    if(isKey(key_test, IS_PRESSED)){
        col.b = 1.0;
    }
    
    fragColor = vec4(col, 0.0);
}
renderpass.name: Image
